articles.title: Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 specs leak, and here's the biggest upgrade - Android Authority
articles.description: The Samsung Galaxy Z Fold 5 is launching soon, and its specs have leaked from trusted sources. Here's what is changing on the foldable.
articles.content:
